name: TownWarfare-LudumDare41
description:
My game combines RTS and FPS genres together, you need to control policemen to fight against zombies.

Heroes, go for it, protect your home!

Game Control

RTS mode:

Left Click&Drag: Units selection.

Right Click: Units Movement.

C (Keyboard): Switch to FPS mode(ONLY WHEN A SINGLE UNIT IS SELECTED).

FPS mode:

Left Click: Shooting.

C (Keyboard): Switch to RTS mode.
